#include <stdint.h>
#include "main.h"
#include "GPIO.h"

int main(void)
{
	MCU_Clock_Setup();
	Delay_Config();
	GPIO_Pin_Setup(GPIOC, 13, GENERAL_PURPOSE_OUTPUT_PUSHPULL, NONE);

    /* Loop forever */
	for(;;)
	{
		GPIOC -> ODR |= 1 << 13;
		Delay_ms(1000);
		GPIOC -> ODR &= ~(1 << 13);
		Delay_ms(1000);
	}
}
